name: Eye See You (Rilo007)
description:
Description

Made in three days for Brackey's Game Jam, I would have spent the whole week on it, but I got busy doing other things.

The game's concept was that a doctor arrived to work to find the whole hospital was dark and floating eyes filled the halls. As soon as the eyes were gone in a room, you were alone and could proceed to the next room. The door locks behind you so you can only go forward. Eventually, you would fight a boss in the Intensive Care Unit, and when defeated, the power room is unlocked and the power to the hospital can be turned back on.

It obviously didn't get that far, but it's as much as I could accomplish in just three days.

Controls

Movement:  WASD / Arrow Keys

Throw Scalpel: Left Click
